Web Service Discovery For Windows Networ.description:
A simple container for Rockstor running samba, so that Windows 10 version 1511 or higher will display the Rockstor host in their Network folder.

This version is geared towards local network workgroup setups only.

Based on the official OCI image, available for amd64 and arm64 architecture.

WSDDN_WORKGROUP.description: Set the workgroup name. Must be the same name used during the setup of the Samba service on the Rockstor appliance.
WSDDN_WORKGROUP.label: Workgroup [e.g. WORKGROUP]
